actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

official_title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan.

summary.text: Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan, adding authority for a transportation project in the Petoskey area.

titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to modify a high priority project in the State of Michigan.
